Plus
Вы сказали:
send me a code to make a social media website vs code
ChatGPT сказал:

Here’s a complete single-file social media website you can paste into index.html and run with Live Server in VS Code.
It has: signup/login (local only), create posts, image upload (as link), likes, comments, follow/unfollow, profiles, search, trending tags, dark mode, and saves everything in localStorage.

Just copy → paste → save → open with Live Server.

html

<script>
/* =========================
   Pulse Mini Social Media
   Single-file localStorage app
========================= */

const store = {
  load(key, fallback){
    try{ return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(key)) ?? fallback; }
    catch(e){ return fallback; }
  },
  save(key, val){ localStorage.setItem(key, JSON.stringify(val)); }
};

let users = store.load("pulse_users", []);
let posts = store.load("pulse_posts", []);
let session = store.load("pulse_session", null);
let theme = store.load("pulse_theme", "dark");

const $ = sel => document.querySelector(sel);
const $$ = sel => Array.from(document.querySelectorAll(sel));

const toast = (msg) => {
  const t = $("#toast");
  t.textContent = msg;
  t.classList.add("show");
  setTimeout(()=>t.classList.remove("show"), 1800);
};

function uid(){ return Math.random().toString(36).slice(2) + Date.now().toString(36); }
function timeAgo(ts){
  const s = Math.floor((Date.now()-ts)/1000);
  if(s<60) return s+"s ago";
  const m=Math.floor(s/60); if(m<60) return m+"m ago";
  const h=Math.floor(m/60); if(h<24) return h+"h ago";
  const d=Math.floor(h/24); return d+"d ago";
}
function initials(name){
  return name.split(" ").map(x=>x[0]).slice(0,2).join("").toUpperCase();
}
function tagsFrom(text){
  return (text.match(/#\w+/g)||[]).map(t=>t.toLowerCase());
}
function mentionsFrom(text){
  return (text.match(/@\w+/g)||[]).map(t=>t.toLowerCase());
}

function persist(){
  store.save("pulse_users", users);
  store.save("pulse_posts", posts);
  store.save("pulse_session", session);
  store.save("pulse_theme", theme);
}

/* ===== AUTH ===== */
function showAuth(show){
  $("#authModal").classList.toggle("hidden", !show);
}
function currentUser(){
  return users.find(u=>u.id===session?.userId) || null;
}
function login(username, password){
  const u = users.find(x=>x.username===username.toLowerCase());
  if(!u || u.password!==password) return false;
  session = { userId: u.id };
  persist();
  return true;
}
function signup(displayName, username, password, bio){
  username = username.toLowerCase().trim();
  if(!username || username.includes(" ")) return "Username invalid.";
  if(users.some(u=>u.username===username)) return "Username already taken.";
  if(password.length<4) return "Password too short.";
  const u = {
    id: uid(),
    name: displayName.trim() || username,
    username,
    password,
    bio: bio?.trim() || "",
    followers: [],
    following: [],
    createdAt: Date.now()
  };
  users.push(u);
  persist();
  return u;
}

/* ===== POSTS ===== */
function canSeePost(p, viewerId){
  if(p.visibility==="public") return true;
  if(p.visibility==="private") return p.authorId===viewerId;
  // followers only
  const author = users.find(u=>u.id===p.authorId);
  return p.authorId===viewerId || author?.followers.includes(viewerId);
}
function createPost(text, imageUrl, visibility){
  const me = currentUser();
  const t = text.trim();
  if(!t) return "Write something first.";
  if(t.length>280) return "Too long (max 280).";
  const p = {
    id: uid(),
    authorId: me.id,
    text: t,
    imageUrl: imageUrl.trim(),
    visibility,
    tags: tagsFrom(t),
    mentions: mentionsFrom(t),
    likes: [],
    savedBy: [],
    comments: [],
    createdAt: Date.now()
  };
  posts.unshift(p);
  persist();
  return p;
}
function toggleLike(postId){
  const me = currentUser();
  const p = posts.find(x=>x.id===postId);
  if(!p) return;
  const i = p.likes.indexOf(me.id);
  if(i>=0) p.likes.splice(i,1);
  else p.likes.push(me.id);
  persist(); renderAll();
}
function toggleSave(postId){
  const me = currentUser();
  const p = posts.find(x=>x.id===postId);
  if(!p) return;
  const i = p.savedBy.indexOf(me.id);
  if(i>=0) p.savedBy.splice(i,1);
  else p.savedBy.push(me.id);
  persist(); renderAll();
}
function addComment(postId, text){
  const me = currentUser();
  const p = posts.find(x=>x.id===postId);
  if(!p) return;
  const c = text.trim();
  if(!c) return;
  p.comments.push({ id: uid(), authorId: me.id, text: c, createdAt: Date.now() });
  persist(); renderAll();
}
function deletePost(postId){
  const me = currentUser();
  const i = posts.findIndex(p=>p.id===postId && p.authorId===me.id);
  if(i>=0){ posts.splice(i,1); persist(); renderAll(); toast("Post deleted");}
}

/* ===== FOLLOW ===== */
function follow(userId){
  const me = currentUser();
  if(me.id===userId) return;
  const other = users.find(u=>u.id===userId);
  if(!other) return;
  if(!me.following.includes(userId)) me.following.push(userId);
  if(!other.followers.includes(me.id)) other.followers.push(me.id);
  persist(); renderAll();
}
function unfollow(userId){
  const me = currentUser();
  const other = users.find(u=>u.id===userId);
  if(!other) return;
  me.following = me.following.filter(x=>x!==userId);
  other.followers = other.followers.filter(x=>x!==me.id);
  persist(); renderAll();
}

/* ===== VIEW STATE ===== */
let view = "feed";
let viewedUserId = null;
let searchQuery = "";
let sortMode = "new";

function setView(v){
  view = v;
  ["feed","profile","people","saved","about"].forEach(x=>{
    $("#" + x + "View").classList.toggle("hidden", v!==x);
    $$(`[data-view="${x}"]`).forEach(a=>a.classList.toggle("active", v===x));
  });
  renderAll();
}

/* ===== RENDER ===== */
function renderMe(){
  const me = currentUser();
  $("#meAvatar").textContent = initials(me.name);
  $("#meName").textContent = me.name;
  $("#meHandle").textContent = "@" + me.username;
  $("#mePosts").textContent = posts.filter(p=>p.authorId===me.id).length + " posts";
  $("#meFollowers").textContent = me.followers.length + " followers";
  $("#meFollowing").textContent = me.following.length + " following";
  $("#composerAvatar").textContent = initials(me.name);
}

function renderTrending(){
  const freq = {};
  posts.forEach(p=>p.tags.forEach(t=>freq[t]=(freq[t]||0)+1));
  const items = Object.entries(freq).sort((a,b)=>b[1]-a[1]).slice(0,6);
  const wrap = $("#trendingList");
  wrap.innerHTML = items.length? "" : `<div class="small">No tags yet</div>`;
  items.forEach(([tag,count])=>{
    const d=document.createElement("div");
    d.className="userline";
    d.innerHTML = `<div class="tag">${tag}</div><div class="space"></div><div class="small">${count} posts</div>`;
    d.onclick=()=>{ searchQuery=tag; $("#searchInput").value=tag; renderAll(); setView("feed"); };
    wrap.appendChild(d);
  });
}

function renderPost(p){
  const me = currentUser();
  const author = users.find(u=>u.id===p.authorId);
  if(!author) return document.createElement("div");

  const liked = p.likes.includes(me.id);
  const saved = p.savedBy.includes(me.id);

  const el=document.createElement("div");
  el.className="post";

  el.innerHTML=`
    <div class="avatar" title="${author.name}">${initials(author.name)}</div>
    <div class="body">
      <div class="meta">
        <b style="cursor:pointer" data-open-profile="${author.id}">${author.name}</b>
        <span class="small">@${author.username}</span>
        <span class="small">• ${timeAgo(p.createdAt)}</span>
        <span class="pill">${p.visibility}</span>
        ${p.authorId===me.id? `<span class="space"></span><button class="btn ghost small" data-del="${p.id}">🗑 delete</button>`:""}
      </div>

      <div class="content">${escapeHtml(p.text)}</div>

      ${p.imageUrl? `<img src="${escapeAttr(p.imageUrl)}" alt="post image" onerror="this.remove()">`:""}

      <div class="tags">
        ${p.tags.map(t=>`<span class="tag" data-tag="${t}">${t}</span>`).join("")}
      </div>

      <div class="icons">
        <div class="iconbtn ${liked?"active":""}" data-like="${p.id}">❤️ ${p.likes.length}</div>
        <div class="iconbtn" data-toggle-comments="${p.id}">💬 ${p.comments.length}</div>
        <div class="iconbtn ${saved?"active":""}" data-save="${p.id}">🔖 ${saved?"Saved":"Save"}</div>
      </div>

      <div class="comments" id="comments-${p.id}">
        <div class="row" style="gap:6px; margin-top:6px">
          <input placeholder="Write a comment..." data-comment-input="${p.id}">
          <button class="btn" data-comment-btn="${p.id}">Send</button>
        </div>
        <div class="list" style="margin-top:6px">
          ${p.comments.map(c=>{
            const cu = users.find(u=>u.id===c.authorId);
            return cu? `
              <div class="comment">
                <div class="avatar sm">${initials(cu.name)}</div>
                <div>
                  <div class="small"><b data-open-profile="${cu.id}" style="cursor:pointer">${cu.name}</b> • ${timeAgo(c.createdAt)}</div>
                  <div>${escapeHtml(c.text)}</div>
                </div>
              </div>`:"";
          }).join("")}
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  `;

  // click handlers
  el.querySelectorAll("[data-like]").forEach(b=>b.onclick=()=>toggleLike(b.dataset.like));
  el.querySelectorAll("[data-save]").forEach(b=>b.onclick=()=>toggleSave(b.dataset.save));
  el.querySelectorAll("[data-toggle-comments]").forEach(b=>b.onclick=()=>{
    $("#comments-"+b.dataset.toggleComments).classList.toggle("open");
  });
  el.querySelectorAll("[data-comment-btn]").forEach(b=>b.onclick=()=>{
    const pid=b.dataset.commentBtn;
    const input=el.querySelector(`[data-comment-input="${pid}"]`);
    addComment(pid, input.value);
    input.value="";
  });
  el.querySelectorAll("[data-tag]").forEach(t=>t.onclick=()=>{
    searchQuery=t.dataset.tag; $("#searchInput").value=searchQuery; setView("feed");
  });
  el.querySelectorAll("[data-open-profile]").forEach(x=>x.onclick=()=>{
    viewedUserId=x.dataset.openProfile; setView("profile");
  });
  el.querySelectorAll("[data-del]").forEach(x=>x.onclick=()=>deletePost(x.dataset.del));

  return el;
}

function renderFeed(){
  const me=currentUser();
  let list=posts.filter(p=>canSeePost(p, me.id));

  if(searchQuery){
    const q=searchQuery.toLowerCase();
    list=list.filter(p=>{
      const author=users.find(u=>u.id===p.authorId);
      return p.text.toLowerCase().includes(q) ||
             p.tags.some(t=>t.includes(q)) ||
             author?.username.includes(q) ||
             author?.name.toLowerCase().includes(q);
    });
  }

  if(sortMode==="top") list=list.slice().sort((a,b)=>b.likes.length-a.likes.length);
  if(sortMode==="mine") list=list.filter(p=>p.authorId===me.id);

  const wrap=$("#feedList");
  wrap.innerHTML="";
  if(!list.length){ wrap.innerHTML=`<div class="small">No posts yet. Be the first!</div>`; return; }
  list.forEach(p=>wrap.appendChild(renderPost(p)));
}

function renderProfile(){
  const me=currentUser();
  let u = viewedUserId? users.find(x=>x.id===viewedUserId) : me;
  if(!u){ u=me; viewedUserId=null; }

  $("#profileAvatar").textContent=initials(u.name);
  $("#profileName").textContent=u.name;
  $("#profileHandle").textContent="@"+u.username;
  $("#profileBio").textContent=u.bio || "No bio yet.";
  $("#profilePosts").textContent=posts.filter(p=>p.authorId===u.id).length+" posts";
  $("#profileFollowers").textContent=u.followers.length+" followers";
  $("#profileFollowing").textContent=u.following.length+" following";

  const isMe = u.id===me.id;
  $("#followBtn").classList.toggle("hidden", isMe || me.following.includes(u.id));
  $("#unfollowBtn").classList.toggle("hidden", isMe || !me.following.includes(u.id));
  $("#followBtn").onclick=()=>follow(u.id);
  $("#unfollowBtn").onclick=()=>unfollow(u.id);

  const wrap=$("#profilePostsList");
  wrap.innerHTML="";
  const myPosts = posts.filter(p=>p.authorId===u.id && canSeePost(p, me.id));
  if(!myPosts.length){ wrap.innerHTML=`<div class="small">No posts yet</div>`; return; }
  myPosts.forEach(p=>wrap.appendChild(renderPost(p)));
}

function renderPeople(){
  const me=currentUser();
  const q=$("#peopleSearch").value.toLowerCase().trim();
  const list=users.filter(u=>u.id!==me.id).filter(u=>{
    if(!q) return true;
    return u.username.includes(q) || u.name.toLowerCase().includes(q);
  });

  const wrap=$("#peopleList");
  wrap.innerHTML="";
  if(!list.length){ wrap.innerHTML=`<div class="small">No users found.</div>`; return; }

  list.forEach(u=>{
    const following = me.following.includes(u.id);
    const d=document.createElement("div");
    d.className="userline";
    d.innerHTML=`
      <div class="avatar">${initials(u.name)}</div>
      <div style="min-width:0">
        <div class="name">${u.name}</div>
        <div class="small">@${u.username}</div>
      </div>
      <div class="space"></div>
      <button class="btn ${following?"bad":"good"}" data-fid="${u.id}">
        ${following?"Unfollow":"Follow"}
      </button>
    `;
    d.querySelector("button").onclick=()=> following ? unfollow(u.id) : follow(u.id);
    d.onclick=(e)=>{ if(e.target.tagName!=="BUTTON"){ viewedUserId=u.id; setView("profile"); } };
    wrap.appendChild(d);
  });
}

function renderSaved(){
  const me=currentUser();
  const list=posts.filter(p=>p.savedBy.includes(me.id) && canSeePost(p, me.id));
  const wrap=$("#savedList");
  wrap.innerHTML="";
  if(!list.length){ wrap.innerHTML=`<div class="small">Nothing saved yet.</div>`; return; }
  list.forEach(p=>wrap.appendChild(renderPost(p)));
}

function renderSuggestions(){
  const me=currentUser();
  const list=users.filter(u=>u.id!==me.id && !me.following.includes(u.id))
                  .sort(()=>Math.random()-0.5).slice(0,5);
  const wrap=$("#suggestList");
  wrap.innerHTML="";
  list.forEach(u=>{
    const d=document.createElement("div");
    d.className="userline";
    d.innerHTML=`
      <div class="avatar sm">${initials(u.name)}</div>
      <div style="min-width:0">
        <div class="name small">${u.name}</div>
        <div class="small">@${u.username}</div>
      </div>
      <div class="space"></div>
      <button class="btn good small">Follow</button>
    `;
    d.querySelector("button").onclick=()=>follow(u.id);
    d.onclick=(e)=>{ if(e.target.tagName!=="BUTTON"){ viewedUserId=u.id; setView("profile"); } };
    wrap.appendChild(d);
  });

  const online=users.filter(u=>u.id!==me.id).sort(()=>Math.random()-0.5).slice(0,6);
  const ow=$("#onlineList");
  ow.innerHTML="";
  online.forEach(u=>{
    const d=document.createElement("div");
    d.className="row userline";
    d.innerHTML=`
      <div class="avatar sm">${initials(u.name)}</div>
      <div class="space">
        <div class="small"><b>${u.name}</b> <span class="small">@${u.username}</span></div>
      </div>
      <div class="online"></div>
    `;
    ow.appendChild(d);
  });
}

function renderAll(){
  renderMe();
  renderTrending();
  renderSuggestions();

  if(view==="feed") renderFeed();
  if(view==="profile") renderProfile();
  if(view==="people") renderPeople();
  if(view==="saved") renderSaved();
}

function escapeHtml(s){
  return s.replace(/[&<>"]/g, c=>({ "&":"&amp;","<":"&lt;",">":"&gt;",'"':"&quot;" }[c]));
}
function escapeAttr(s){
  return s.replace(/"/g,"&quot;");
}

/* ===== EVENTS ===== */
$("#postText").addEventListener("input", ()=>{
  const n=$("#postText").value.length;
  $("#charCount").textContent=`${n} / 280`;
  $("#charCount").style.color = n>280 ? "var(--bad)" : "var(--muted)";
});

$("#postBtn").onclick=()=>{
  const p=createPost($("#postText").value, $("#imageUrl").value, $("#visibility").value);
  if(typeof p==="string") return toast(p);
  $("#postText").value=""; $("#imageUrl").value=""; $("#charCount").textContent="0 / 280";
  toast("Posted!");
  renderAll();
};

$$("[data-view]").forEach(a=>a.onclick=(e)=>{
  e.preventDefault();
  setView(a.dataset.view);
});

$("#sortFeed").onchange=()=>{ sortMode=$("#sortFeed").value; renderAll(); };

$("#searchInput").addEventListener("input", ()=>{
  searchQuery=$("#searchInput").value.trim();
  renderAll();
});

$("#peopleSearch").addEventListener("input", renderPeople);

$("#logoutBtn").onclick=()=>{
  session=null; persist(); location.reload();
};

$("#themeBtn").onclick=()=>{
  theme = theme==="dark" ? "light" : "dark";
  applyTheme();
  persist();
};

function applyTheme(){
  document.documentElement.setAttribute("data-theme", theme);
  $("#themeBtn").textContent = theme==="dark" ? "🌙" : "☀️";
}

$("#editProfileBtn").onclick=()=>{
  const me=currentUser();
  const name=prompt("Display name:", me.name) ?? me.name;
  const bio=prompt("Bio:", me.bio) ?? me.bio;
  me.name=name.trim()||me.name;
  me.bio=bio.trim();
  persist(); renderAll(); toast("Profile updated");
};

/* ===== AUTH UI ===== */
$("#authTabs").addEventListener("click",(e)=>{
  const tab=e.target?.dataset?.tab;
  if(!tab) return;
  $("#loginTab").classList.toggle("hidden", tab!=="login");
  $("#signupTab").classList.toggle("hidden", tab!=="signup");
  $$("#authTabs .btn").forEach(b=>b.classList.toggle("brand", b.dataset.tab===tab));
});

$("#loginBtn").onclick=()=>{
  const ok=login($("#loginUser").value, $("#loginPass").value);
  if(!ok) return toast("Wrong username or password");
  showAuth(false); boot();
};

$("#signupBtn").onclick=()=>{
  const u=signup($("#signupName").value, $("#signupUser").value, $("#signupPass").value, $("#signupBio").value);
  if(typeof u==="string") return toast(u);
  session={userId:u.id}; persist();
  showAuth(false); boot(); toast("Account created!");
};

/* ===== INIT ===== */
function seedIfEmpty(){
  if(users.length) return;
  const a=signup("Alex River","alex","1234","I like tech & music.");
  const b=signup("Maya Chen","maya","1234","Coffee + coding.");
  const c=signup("Sam K.","sam","1234","Traveling the world.");
  session={userId:a.id};

  posts = [
    {
      id:uid(), authorId:b.id, text:"Hello Pulse! #firstpost",
      imageUrl:"https://picsum.photos/900/450?1", visibility:"public",
      tags:["#firstpost"], mentions:[], likes:[a.id], savedBy:[], comments:[], createdAt:Date.now()-1000*60*33
    },
    {
      id:uid(), authorId:a.id, text:"Building a mini social app in one file 😄 #webdev #javascript",
      imageUrl:"", visibility:"public",
      tags:["#webdev","#javascript"], mentions:[], likes:[b.id,c.id], savedBy:[c.id], comments:[
        {id:uid(), authorId:c.id, text:"This is awesome!", createdAt:Date.now()-1000*60*10}
      ], createdAt:Date.now()-1000*60*70
    }
  ];
  a.following=[b.id,c.id]; b.followers=[a.id]; c.followers=[a.id];
  persist();
}

function boot(){
  applyTheme();
  if(!session){ showAuth(true); return; }
  showAuth(false);
  setView("feed");
  renderAll();
}

seedIfEmpty();
boot();

</script>
</body>
</html>

Totally get what you want — a “real-looking” project with lots of code. But I can’t realistically paste 1000+ lines in one chat reply without it getting truncated or broken. So here’s the best way to give you something actually better:

3) app.js

javascript
/* ===========================================================
   Pulse+ Social Media (Local Demo)
   - Multi-view app
   - localStorage "backend"
   - modular structure
   - ready to expand to 1000+ lines
=========================================================== */

/* =======================
   Utilities / Storage
======================= */
const store = {
  load(key, fallback){
    try { return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(key)) ?? fallback; }
    catch { return fallback; }
  },
  save(key, val){
    localStorage.setItem(key, JSON.stringify(val));
  }
};

const $ = (s) => document.querySelector(s);
const $$ = (s) => Array.from(document.querySelectorAll(s));

const uid = () =>
  Math.random().toString(36).slice(2) + Date.now().toString(36);

const timeAgo = (ts) => {
  const sec = Math.floor((Date.now()-ts)/1000);
  if(sec < 60) return `${sec}s ago`;
  const min = Math.floor(sec/60);
  if(min < 60) return `${min}m ago`;
  const hr = Math.floor(min/60);
  if(hr < 24) return `${hr}h ago`;
  return `${Math.floor(hr/24)}d ago`;
};

const initials = (name) =>
  name.split(" ").map(w=>w[0]).slice(0,2).join("").toUpperCase();

const tagsFrom = (text) =>
  (text.match(/#\w+/g) || []).map(t=>t.toLowerCase());

const mentionsFrom = (text) =>
  (text.match(/@\w+/g) || []).map(m=>m.toLowerCase());

const escapeHtml = (s) =>
  s.replace(/[&<>"]/g, c => ({
    "&":"&amp;","<":"&lt;",">":"&gt;",'"':"&quot;"
  }[c]));

/* =======================
   App State
======================= */
let users   = store.load("pulse_users_plus", []);
let posts   = store.load("pulse_posts_plus", []);
let session = store.load("pulse_session_plus", null);
let theme   = store.load("pulse_theme_plus", "dark");
let settings= store.load("pulse_settings_plus", {
  gifs:"yes",
  density:"comfortable"
});

let view = "feed";
let viewedUserId = null;
let searchQuery = "";
let sortMode = "new";

/* =======================
   Notifications (local)
======================= */
function notify(userId, type, payload){
  const u = users.find(x=>x.id===userId);
  if(!u) return;
  u.notifications = u.notifications || [];
  u.notifications.unshift({
    id: uid(),
    type,
    payload,
    createdAt: Date.now(),
    read:false
  });
}

/* =======================
   Persistence
======================= */
function persist(){
  store.save("pulse_users_plus", users);
  store.save("pulse_posts_plus", posts);
  store.save("pulse_session_plus", session);
  store.save("pulse_theme_plus", theme);
  store.save("pulse_settings_plus", settings);
}

/* =======================
   Auth
======================= */
function currentUser(){
  return users.find(u=>u.id===session?.userId) || null;
}

function showAuth(show){
  $("#authBackdrop").classList.toggle("hidden", !show);
}

function login(username, password){
  const u = users.find(x=>x.username===username.toLowerCase());
  if(!u || u.password!==password) return false;
  session = { userId: u.id };
  persist();
  return true;
}

function signup(name, username, password, bio){
  username = username.toLowerCase().trim();
  if(!username || username.includes(" ")) return "Invalid username.";
  if(users.some(u=>u.username===username)) return "Username taken.";
  if(password.length<4) return "Password too short.";

  const u = {
    id: uid(),
    name: name.trim() || username,
    username,
    password,
    bio: bio?.trim() || "",
    followers: [],
    following: [],
    createdAt: Date.now(),
    notifications: []
  };
  users.push(u);
  persist();
  return u;
}

/* =======================
   Visibility rules
======================= */
function canSeePost(p, viewerId){
  if(p.visibility==="public") return true;
  if(p.visibility==="private") return p.authorId===viewerId;

  const author = users.find(u=>u.id===p.authorId);
  return p.authorId===viewerId || author?.followers.includes(viewerId);
}

/* =======================
   Post creation + Polls
======================= */
function createPost({text, imageUrl, visibility, mood, poll}){
  const me = currentUser();
  const t = text.trim();
  if(!t) return "Write something first.";
  if(t.length>280) return "Too long. Max 280.";

  const p = {
    id: uid(),
    authorId: me.id,
    text: t,
    imageUrl: imageUrl.trim(),
    visibility,
    mood: mood || "",
    tags: tagsFrom(t),
    mentions: mentionsFrom(t),
    likes: [],
    savedBy: [],
    comments: [],
    poll: poll || null,
    createdAt: Date.now()
  };
  posts.unshift(p);

  // notify mentioned users
  p.mentions.forEach(m=>{
    const uname=m.slice(1);
    const u=users.find(x=>x.username===uname);
    if(u) notify(u.id, "mention", {postId:p.id, by:me.id});
  });

  persist();
  return p;
}

/* =======================
   Post interactions
======================= */
function toggleLike(postId){
  const me = currentUser();
  const p = posts.find(x=>x.id===postId);
  if(!p) return;
  const i = p.likes.indexOf(me.id);

  if(i>=0){
    p.likes.splice(i,1);
  }else{
    p.likes.push(me.id);
    if(p.authorId!==me.id)
      notify(p.authorId,"like",{postId, by:me.id});
  }

  persist(); renderAll();
}

function toggleSave(postId){
  const me = currentUser();
  const p = posts.find(x=>x.id===postId);
  if(!p) return;
  const i = p.savedBy.indexOf(me.id);
  if(i>=0) p.savedBy.splice(i,1);
  else p.savedBy.push(me.id);
  persist(); renderAll();
}

function addComment(postId, text){
  const me = currentUser();
  const p = posts.find(x=>x.id===postId);
  if(!p) return;
  const c = text.trim();
  if(!c) return;

  p.comments.push({
    id: uid(),
    authorId: me.id,
    text: c,
    createdAt: Date.now()
  });

  if(p.authorId!==me.id)
    notify(p.authorId,"comment",{postId, by:me.id, text:c});

  persist(); renderAll();
}

function votePoll(postId, optionIndex){
  const me = currentUser();
  const p = posts.find(x=>x.id===postId);
  if(!p || !p.poll) return;

  p.poll.votes = p.poll.votes || {};
  p.poll.votes[me.id] = optionIndex; // overwrite vote allowed
  persist(); renderAll();
}

function deletePost(postId){
  const me = currentUser();
  const i = posts.findIndex(p=>p.id===postId && p.authorId===me.id);
  if(i>=0){
    posts.splice(i,1);
    persist(); renderAll(); toast("Post deleted");
  }
}

/* =======================
   Follow system
======================= */
function follow(userId){
  const me=currentUser();
  if(me.id===userId) return;
  const other=users.find(u=>u.id===userId);
  if(!other) return;

  if(!me.following.includes(userId)) me.following.push(userId);
  if(!other.followers.includes(me.id)) other.followers.push(me.id);

  notify(userId,"follow",{by:me.id});
  persist(); renderAll();
}

function unfollow(userId){
  const me=currentUser();
  const other=users.find(u=>u.id===userId);
  if(!other) return;

  me.following = me.following.filter(x=>x!==userId);
  other.followers = other.followers.filter(x=>x!==me.id);

  persist(); renderAll();
}

/* =======================
   View Router
======================= */
function setView(v){
  view=v;

  // top nav highlight
  $$(".navbtn").forEach(b=>b.classList.toggle("active", b.dataset.view===v));

  // hide/show views
  const views = ["feed","profile","people","saved","explore","messages","notifications"];
  views.forEach(x=>{
    $("#" + x + "View").classList.toggle("hidden", x!==v);
  });

  renderAll();
}

/* =======================
   Rendering
======================= */
function renderMe(){
  const me=currentUser();
  $("#meAvatar").textContent = initials(me.name);
  $("#meName").textContent = me.name;
  $("#meHandle").textContent = "@"+me.username;

  $("#mePosts").textContent = posts.filter(p=>p.authorId===me.id).length;
  $("#meFollowers").textContent = me.followers.length;
  $("#meFollowing").textContent = me.following.length;

  $("#composerAvatar").textContent = initials(me.name);
}

/* Trending tags */
function renderTrending(){
  const freq={};
  posts.forEach(p=>p.tags.forEach(t=>freq[t]=(freq[t]||0)+1));
  const items=Object.entries(freq).sort((a,b)=>b[1]-a[1]).slice(0,8);

  const wrap=$("#trendingList");
  wrap.innerHTML = items.length ? "" : `<div class="muted tiny">No tags yet</div>`;

  items.forEach(([tag,count])=>{
    const d=document.createElement("div");
    d.className="trend-item";
    d.innerHTML = `<span class="tag">${tag}</span><span class="muted tiny">${count} posts</span>`;
    d.onclick=()=>{
      searchQuery=tag;
      $("#globalSearch").value=tag;
      setView("feed");
    };
    wrap.appendChild(d);
  });
}

/* Post Card */
function renderPost(p){
  const me=currentUser();
  const author=users.find(u=>u.id===p.authorId);
  if(!author) return document.createElement("div");

  const el=document.createElement("div");
  el.className="post";

  const liked = p.likes.includes(me.id);
  const saved = p.savedBy.includes(me.id);

  // build poll HTML if exists
  let pollHtml = "";
  if(p.poll){
    const totalVotes = Object.keys(p.poll.votes||{}).length || 0;
    const myVote = (p.poll.votes||{})[me.id];

    pollHtml = `
      <div class="poll">
        <div class="muted tiny" style="margin-bottom:4px">📊 ${escapeHtml(p.poll.question)}</div>
        ${p.poll.options.map((opt,i)=>{
          const votesFor = Object.values(p.poll.votes||{}).filter(v=>v===i).length;
          const pct = totalVotes ? Math.round(votesFor/totalVotes*100) : 0;
          const chosen = myVote===i;
          return `
            <button class="poll-opt ${chosen?"chosen":""}" data-vote="${p.id}:${i}">
              <span>${escapeHtml(opt)}</span>
              <span class="muted tiny">${votesFor} (${pct}%)</span>
              <div class="bar" style="width:${pct}%"></div>
            </button>
          `;
        }).join("")}
        <div class="muted tiny">${totalVotes} total votes</div>
      </div>
    `;
  }

  el.innerHTML=`
    <div class="avatar">${initials(author.name)}</div>
    <div class="post-body">
      <div class="post-meta">
        <span class="post-author" data-open="${author.id}">${escapeHtml(author.name)}</span>
        <span class="post-handle">@${author.username}</span>
        <span class="post-time">• ${timeAgo(p.createdAt)}</span>
        <span class="post-visibility">${p.visibility}</span>
        ${p.mood? `<span class="post-visibility">Mood: ${p.mood}</span>`:""}
        ${p.authorId===me.id? `<button class="ghost tiny-btn" data-del="${p.id}">🗑 delete</button>`:""}
      </div>

      <div class="post-text">${escapeHtml(p.text)}</div>
      ${p.imageUrl? `<img class="post-img" src="${p.imageUrl}" onerror="this.remove()">`:""}
      ${pollHtml}

      <div class="tags">
        ${p.tags.map(t=>`<span class="tag" data-tag="${t}">${t}</span>`).join("")}
      </div>

      <div class="post-actions">
        <button class="action ${liked?"active":""}" data-like="${p.id}">❤️ ${p.likes.length}</button>
        <button class="action" data-toggle-comments="${p.id}">💬 ${p.comments.length}</button>
        <button class="action ${saved?"active":""}" data-save="${p.id}">🔖 ${saved?"Saved":"Save"}</button>
        <button class="action" data-share="${p.id}">↗ Share</button>
      </div>

      <div class="comments" id="comments-${p.id}">
        <div class="row">
          <input placeholder="Write a comment..." data-comment-input="${p.id}">
          <button class="btn mini" data-comment-btn="${p.id}">Send</button>
        </div>
        <div class="list" style="margin-top:6px">
          ${p.comments.map(c=>{
            const cu=users.find(u=>u.id===c.authorId);
            if(!cu) return "";
            return `
              <div class="comment">
                <div class="avatar" style="width:28px;height:28px;font-size:12px">${initials(cu.name)}</div>
                <div>
                  <div class="muted tiny">
                    <b data-open="${cu.id}" style="cursor:pointer">${escapeHtml(cu.name)}</b> • ${timeAgo(c.createdAt)}
                  </div>
                  <div>${escapeHtml(c.text)}</div>
                </div>
              </div>
            `;
          }).join("")}
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  `;

  // handlers
  el.querySelectorAll("[data-like]").forEach(b=>b.onclick=()=>toggleLike(b.dataset.like));
  el.querySelectorAll("[data-save]").forEach(b=>b.onclick=()=>toggleSave(b.dataset.save));
  el.querySelectorAll("[data-share]").forEach(b=>b.onclick=()=>{
    navigator.clipboard.writeText(location.href + "#post=" + p.id);
    toast("Copied share link!");
  });

  el.querySelectorAll("[data-toggle-comments]").forEach(b=>b.onclick=()=>{
    $("#comments-"+b.dataset.toggleComments).classList.toggle("open");
  });

  el.querySelectorAll("[data-comment-btn]").forEach(b=>b.onclick=()=>{
    const pid=b.dataset.commentBtn;
    const input=el.querySelector(`[data-comment-input="${pid}"]`);
    addComment(pid,input.value);
    input.value="";
  });

  el.querySelectorAll("[data-open]").forEach(x=>x.onclick=()=>{
    viewedUserId=x.dataset.open;
    setView("profile");
  });

  el.querySelectorAll("[data-tag]").forEach(t=>t.onclick=()=>{
    searchQuery=t.dataset.tag;
    $("#globalSearch").value=searchQuery;
    setView("feed");
  });

  el.querySelectorAll("[data-del]").forEach(x=>x.onclick=()=>deletePost(x.dataset.del));

  el.querySelectorAll("[data-vote]").forEach(v=>v.onclick=()=>{
    const [pid, idx] = v.dataset.vote.split(":");
    votePoll(pid, Number(idx));
  });

  return el;
}

function renderFeed(){
  const me=currentUser();
  let list=posts.filter(p=>canSeePost(p, me.id));

  // search
  if(searchQuery){
    const q=searchQuery.toLowerCase();
    list=list.filter(p=>{
      const a=users.find(u=>u.id===p.authorId);
      return p.text.toLowerCase().includes(q) ||
             p.tags.some(t=>t.includes(q)) ||
             a?.username.includes(q) ||
             a?.name.toLowerCase().includes(q);
    });
  }

  // sort
  if(sortMode==="top") list=list.slice().sort((a,b)=>b.likes.length-a.likes.length);
  if(sortMode==="mine") list=list.filter(p=>p.authorId===me.id);
  if(sortMode==="following") list=list.filter(p=>me.following.includes(p.authorId));

  const wrap=$("#feedList");
  wrap.innerHTML="";
  if(!list.length){
    wrap.innerHTML=`<div class="muted">No posts yet.</div>`;
    return;
  }
  list.forEach(p=>wrap.appendChild(renderPost(p)));
}

function renderProfile(){
  const me=currentUser();
  let u = viewedUserId ? users.find(x=>x.id===viewedUserId) : me;
  if(!u){ u=me; viewedUserId=null; }

  // header
  $("#profileHeader").innerHTML = `
    <div class="row">
      <div class="avatar lg">${initials(u.name)}</div>
      <div style="flex:1">
        <div style="font-weight:900;font-size:20px">${escapeHtml(u.name)}</div>
        <div class="muted">@${u.username}</div>
        <div class="muted tiny" style="margin-top:6px">${escapeHtml(u.bio||"No bio yet.")}</div>
        <div class="row muted tiny" style="gap:12px;margin-top:6px">
          <div>${posts.filter(p=>p.authorId===u.id).length} posts</div>
          <div>${u.followers.length} followers</div>
          <div>${u.following.length} following</div>
        </div>
      </div>
      ${
        u.id===me.id ? "" :
        me.following.includes(u.id)
          ? `<button class="btn bad" id="unfollowBtn">Unfollow</button>`
          : `<button class="btn good" id="followBtn">Follow</button>`
      }
    </div>
  `;

  // follow buttons
  const fb=$("#followBtn");
  if(fb) fb.onclick=()=>follow(u.id);
  const ufb=$("#unfollowBtn");
  if(ufb) ufb.onclick=()=>unfollow(u.id);

  // posts
  const wrap=$("#profilePostsList");
  wrap.innerHTML="";
  const list=posts.filter(p=>p.authorId===u.id && canSeePost(p, me.id));
  if(!list.length){ wrap.innerHTML=`<div class="muted">No posts yet</div>`; return; }
  list.forEach(p=>wrap.appendChild(renderPost(p)));
}

function renderPeople(){
  const me=currentUser();
  const q=$("#peopleSearch").value.toLowerCase().trim();
  const list=users.filter(u=>u.id!==me.id).filter(u=>{
    if(!q) return true;
    return u.username.includes(q) || u.name.toLowerCase().includes(q);
  });

  const wrap=$("#peopleList"); wrap.innerHTML="";
  if(!list.length){ wrap.innerHTML=`<div class="muted">No users found.</div>`; return; }

  list.forEach(u=>{
    const following = me.following.includes(u.id);
    const d=document.createElement("div");
    d.className="card row-between";
    d.style.padding="8px";
    d.innerHTML=`
      <div class="row">
        <div class="avatar" style="width:34px;height:34px">${initials(u.name)}</div>
        <div>
          <div style="font-weight:800">${escapeHtml(u.name)}</div>
          <div class="muted tiny">@${u.username}</div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <button class="btn ${following?"bad":"good"}">${following?"Unfollow":"Follow"}</button>
    `;
    d.querySelector("button").onclick=()=>following?unfollow(u.id):follow(u.id);
    d.onclick=(e)=>{ if(e.target.tagName!=="BUTTON"){ viewedUserId=u.id; setView("profile"); } };
    wrap.appendChild(d);
  });
}

function renderSaved(){
  const me=currentUser();
  const list=posts.filter(p=>p.savedBy.includes(me.id) && canSeePost(p, me.id));
  const wrap=$("#savedList"); wrap.innerHTML="";
  if(!list.length){ wrap.innerHTML=`<div class="muted">Nothing saved yet.</div>`; return; }
  list.forEach(p=>wrap.appendChild(renderPost(p)));
}

function renderExplore(){
  // explore = public only, random order
  const me=currentUser();
  const list=posts.filter(p=>p.visibility==="public" && canSeePost(p, me.id))
                  .slice().sort(()=>Math.random()-0.5);

  const wrap=$("#exploreList"); wrap.innerHTML="";
  if(!list.length){ wrap.innerHTML=`<div class="muted">Nothing to explore.</div>`; return; }
  list.forEach(p=>wrap.appendChild(renderPost(p)));
}

function renderNotifications(){
  const me=currentUser();
  const list=me.notifications || [];
  const wrap=$("#notifList"); wrap.innerHTML="";

  if(!list.length){
    wrap.innerHTML=`<div class="muted">No notifications.</div>`;
    return;
  }

  list.forEach(n=>{
    const by=users.find(u=>u.id===n.payload?.by);
    let text="Notification";
    if(n.type==="like") text=`❤️ ${by?.name||"Someone"} liked your post`;
    if(n.type==="comment") text=`💬 ${by?.name||"Someone"} commented: "${n.payload.text}"`;
    if(n.type==="follow") text=`➕ ${by?.name||"Someone"} followed you`;
    if(n.type==="mention") text=`📣 You were mentioned in a post`;

    const d=document.createElement("div");
    d.className="card";
    d.style.padding="8px";
    d.innerHTML=`
      <div style="font-weight:700">${escapeHtml(text)}</div>
      <div class="muted tiny">${timeAgo(n.createdAt)}</div>
    `;
    wrap.appendChild(d);
  });
}

function renderSuggestions(){
  const me=currentUser();
  const list=users.filter(u=>u.id!==me.id && !me.following.includes(u.id))
                  .sort(()=>Math.random()-0.5).slice(0,6);

  const wrap=$("#suggestList"); wrap.innerHTML="";
  list.forEach(u=>{
    const d=document.createElement("div");
    d.className="row-between card";
    d.style.padding="8px";
    d.innerHTML=`
      <div class="row">
        <div class="avatar" style="width:30px;height:30px;font-size:12px">${initials(u.name)}</div>
        <div>
          <div style="font-weight:800;font-size:13px">${escapeHtml(u.name)}</div>
          <div class="muted tiny">@${u.username}</div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <button class="btn good tiny-btn">Follow</button>
    `;
    d.querySelector("button").onclick=()=>follow(u.id);
    d.onclick=(e)=>{ if(e.target.tagName!=="BUTTON"){ viewedUserId=u.id; setView("profile"); } };
    wrap.appendChild(d);
  });

  const online=users.filter(u=>u.id!==me.id).slice(0,6);
  const ow=$("#onlineList"); ow.innerHTML="";
  online.forEach(u=>{
    const d=document.createElement("div");
    d.className="row card";
    d.style.padding="8px";
    d.innerHTML=`
      <div class="avatar" style="width:26px;height:26px;font-size:11px">${initials(u.name)}</div>
      <div style="flex:1">
        <div class="tiny"><b>${escapeHtml(u.name)}</b> <span class="muted">@${u.username}</span></div>
      </div>
      <div style="width:7px;height:7px;border-radius:50%;background:var(--good)"></div>
    `;
    ow.appendChild(d);
  });
}

function renderAll(){
  renderMe();
  renderTrending();
  renderSuggestions();

  if(view==="feed") renderFeed();
  if(view==="profile") renderProfile();
  if(view==="people") renderPeople();
  if(view==="saved") renderSaved();
  if(view==="explore") renderExplore();
  if(view==="notifications") renderNotifications();
}

/* =======================
   Poll Builder UI

let pollEnabled=false;
function showPollBuilder(show){
  pollEnabled=show;
  $("#pollBuilder").classList.toggle("hidden", !show);
}
function addPollOptionRow(value=""){
  const row=document.createElement("input");
  row.placeholder="Option...";
  row.value=value;
  $("#pollOptions").appendChild(row);
}

/* =======================
   Toast
======================= */
function toast(msg){
  const t=$("#toast");
  t.textContent=msg;
  t.classList.add("show");
  setTimeout(()=>t.classList.remove("show"),1600);
}

/* =======================
   Theme / Settings
======================= */
function applyTheme(){
  document.documentElement.setAttribute("data-theme", theme);
  $("#themeToggle").textContent = theme==="dark"?"🌙":"☀️";
}
function openSettings(show){
  $("#settingsBackdrop").classList.toggle("hidden", !show);
}

/* =======================
   Seed demo data

function seedIfEmpty(){
  if(users.length) return;
  const a=signup("Alex River","alex","1234","I like tech & music.");
  const b=signup("Maya Chen","maya","1234","Coffee + coding.");
  const c=signup("Sam K.","sam","1234","Traveling.");

  session={userId:a.id};

  posts = [
    {
      id:uid(), authorId:b.id,
      text:"Hello Pulse+! #firstpost",
      imageUrl:"https://picsum.photos/900/450?1",
      visibility:"public",
      mood:"happy",
      tags:["#firstpost"], mentions:[],
      likes:[a.id], savedBy:[], comments:[],
      poll:null,
      createdAt:Date.now()-1000*60*33
    },
    {
      id:uid(), authorId:a.id,
      text:"Building a bigger social app 🤝 #webdev #javascript",
      imageUrl:"",
      visibility:"public",
      mood:"hyped",
      tags:["#webdev","#javascript"], mentions:[],
      likes:[b.id,c.id], savedBy:[c.id],
      comments:[
        {id:uid(), authorId:c.id, text:"This is awesome!", createdAt:Date.now()-1000*60*10}
      ],
      poll:{
        question:"What feature next?",
        options:["Stories","Reels","Groups","Marketplace"],
        votes:{}
      },
      createdAt:Date.now()-1000*60*70
    }
  ];

  a.following=[b.id,c.id];
  b.followers=[a.id]; c.followers=[a.id];

  persist();
}

/* =======================
   Events Wiring
======================= */
function wireEvents(){
  // top nav
  $$(".navbtn").forEach(b=>b.onclick=()=>setView(b.dataset.view));

  // sidebar shortcuts
  $$(".shortcut").forEach(b=>b.onclick=()=>setView(b.dataset.view));

  // composer char count
  $("#postText").addEventListener("input", ()=>{
    const n=$("#postText").value.length;
    $("#charCount").textContent=`${n}/280`;
    $("#charCount").style.color = n>280 ? "var(--bad)" : "var(--muted)";
  });

  // post submit
  $("#postBtn").onclick=()=>{
    const poll = pollEnabled ? {
      question: $("#pollQuestion").value.trim(),
      options: $$("#pollOptions input").map(i=>i.value.trim()).filter(Boolean),
      votes: {}
    } : null;

    if(pollEnabled && (!poll.question || poll.options.length<2)){
      return toast("Poll needs a question + 2 options");
    }

    const res=createPost({
      text:$("#postText").value,
      imageUrl:$("#imageUrl").value,
      visibility:$("#visibility").value,
      mood:$("#mood").value,
      poll
    });

    if(typeof res==="string") return toast(res);

    $("#postText").value="";
    $("#imageUrl").value="";
    $("#mood").value="";
    $("#charCount").textContent="0/280";

    showPollBuilder(false);
    $("#pollQuestion").value="";
    $("#pollOptions").innerHTML="";

    toast("Posted!");
    renderAll();
  };

  // sort feed
  $("#sortFeed").onchange=()=>{
    sortMode=$("#sortFeed").value;
    renderAll();
  };

  // people search
  $("#peopleSearch").addEventListener("input", renderPeople);

  // global search
  $("#globalSearch").addEventListener("input", ()=>{
    searchQuery=$("#globalSearch").value.trim();
    renderAll();
  });
  $("#clearSearch").onclick=()=>{
    searchQuery="";
    $("#globalSearch").value="";
    renderAll();
  };

  // poll buttons
  $("#addPollBtn").onclick=()=>{
    showPollBuilder(!pollEnabled);
    if(pollEnabled && !$("#pollOptions").children.length){
      addPollOptionRow();
      addPollOptionRow();
    }
  };
  $("#addPollOption").onclick=()=>addPollOptionRow();
  $("#removePoll").onclick=()=>{
    showPollBuilder(false);
    $("#pollQuestion").value="";
    $("#pollOptions").innerHTML="";
  };

  // edit profile
  $("#editProfileBtn").onclick=()=>{
    const me=currentUser();
    const name=prompt("Display name:", me.name) ?? me.name;
    const bio=prompt("Bio:", me.bio) ?? me.bio;
    me.name=name.trim()||me.name;
    me.bio=bio.trim();
    persist(); renderAll(); toast("Profile updated");
  };

  // theme toggle
  $("#themeToggle").onclick=()=>{
    theme = theme==="dark" ? "light" : "dark";
    applyTheme(); persist();
  };

  // settings
  $("#openSettings").onclick=()=>openSettings(true);
  $("#closeSettings").onclick=()=>openSettings(false);

  $("#settingGifs").value=settings.gifs;
  $("#settingDensity").value=settings.density;

  $("#settingGifs").onchange=()=>{
    settings.gifs=$("#settingGifs").value; persist(); toast("Saved");
  };
  $("#settingDensity").onchange=()=>{
    settings.density=$("#settingDensity").value; persist(); toast("Saved");
  };

  $("#resetApp").onclick=()=>{
    if(confirm("Reset everything?")){
      localStorage.removeItem("pulse_users_plus");
      localStorage.removeItem("pulse_posts_plus");
      localStorage.removeItem("pulse_session_plus");
      location.reload();
    }
  };

  // logout
  $("#logoutBtn").onclick=()=>{
    session=null; persist(); location.reload();
  };

  // auth tabs
  $$(".tab").forEach(t=>t.onclick=()=>{
    $$(".tab").forEach(x=>x.classList.remove("active"));
    t.classList.add("active");
    const tab=t.dataset.tab;
    $("#loginTab").classList.toggle("hidden", tab!=="login");
    $("#signupTab").classList.toggle("hidden", tab!=="signup");
  });

  // login/signup
  $("#loginBtn").onclick=()=>{
    const ok=login($("#loginUser").value, $("#loginPass").value);
    if(!ok) return toast("Wrong username or password");
    showAuth(false); boot();
  };

  $("#signupBtn").onclick=()=>{
    const u=signup($("#signupName").value, $("#signupUser").value,
                   $("#signupPass").value, $("#signupBio").value);
    if(typeof u==="string") return toast(u);
    session={userId:u.id}; persist();
    showAuth(false); boot(); toast("Account created!");
  };
}

/* =======================
   App Boot
======================= */
function boot(){
  applyTheme();
  if(!session){ showAuth(true); return; }
  showAuth(false);
  setView("feed");
  renderAll();
}

/* =======================
   Initialize
======================= */
seedIfEmpty();
wireEvents();
boot();

ChatGPT сказал:

That CSS error “at-rule or selector expected” almost always means: your CSS got broken right before that line. VS Code is telling you that at line 366, column 51 it found something that is not valid CSS, like:

  • an extra }

  • a missing { earlier

  • random text/HTML inside the <style> block

  • a comma or colon in the wrong place

  • a rule that wasn’t closed

Since I can’t see your exact file, here’s the quickest way to fix it in 2 minutes:

✅ Step-by-step fix

  1. Go to line 366 in index.html.
    In VS Code press Ctrl+G → type 366 → Enter.

  2. Look at that line and the few lines above it.
    You’re hunting for one of these patterns:

A) Extra closing brace

css
.someClass {
  color: red;
}}   /* ❌ extra } breaks CSS */

Fix → delete one }.

B) Missing opening brace

css
.someClass 
  color: red;  /* ❌ no { */
}

Fix:

css
.someClass {
  color: red;
}

C) Missing semicolon before next rule

css
.someClass {
  color: red   /* ❌ missing ; */
  background: blue;
}

Fix:

css
.someClass {
  color: red;
  background: blue;
}

D) HTML accidentally inside CSS

This is SUPER common in single-file projects:

css
.someClass {
  color: red;
  <div>hello</div>  /* ❌ HTML inside CSS */
}

Fix → delete the HTML or move it outside <style>.

E) Broken @media rule

css
@media (max-width: 720px)
  .box { width: 100%; }  /* ❌ missing { after @media */

Fix:

css
@media (max-width: 720px){
  .box { width: 100%; }
}

✅ Fast “find the real spot”

Even if VS Code shows line 366, the real mistake is often a few lines earlier.

So do this:

  • Scroll up 20–30 lines above 366

  • Count braces:

    • every { must have a matching }

  • If braces don’t match, that’s your bug.

No waiting, no back-and-forth — just paste that slice and I’ll fix it.

ChatGPT сказал:

Yep — “property value expected” at line 366 col 45 means there’s a CSS property that has no valid value right there. Common examples:

1) You wrote a property but forgot the value

css
background: ;     /* ❌ value missing */
color: ;          /* ❌ value missing */
width: px;        /* ❌ number missing */

Fix:

css
background: #000;
color: white;
width: 200px;

2) You left a dangling colon or comma

css
border: 1px solid ;  /* ❌ missing color */
box-shadow: 0 0 10px, ; /* ❌ extra comma */

Fix:

css
border: 1px solid #fff;
box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0,0,0,.4);

3) You used quotes or brackets wrong

css
font-family: "Inter;  /* ❌ missing closing quote */
transform: translate(10px ); /* ✅ ok */
transform: translate(,10px);  /* ❌ invalid */

Fix:

css
font-family: "Inter";
transform: translate(10px, 10px);

4) A variable is broken (super common)

css
color: var(--text   /* ❌ missing ) */
background: var();  /* ❌ empty var */

Fix:

css
color: var(--text);
background: var(--panel);

5) You typed something that’s not CSS

css
height: 100% **;  /* ❌ random characters */

Fix → delete junk.

When a property value is missing, the parser gets confused,

  • at-rule or selector expected

So you only need to fix the broken property at line 366.

      background:var(--panel);
      border:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.08);
      padding:7px 10px;
      border-radius:999px;
      box-shadow:var(--shadow);
    }
    .searchbar input{
      flex:1; background:transparent; border:0; outline:none; color:var(--text);
      font-size:14px;
    }

    /* ===== Buttons ===== */
    .btn{
      background:var(--panel2);
      border:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.10);
      color:var(--text);
      padding:8px 12px;
      border-radius:12px;
      cursor:pointer;
      font-weight:800;
      transition:.12s transform,.12s opacity;
    }
    .btn:hover{transform:translateY(-1px); opacity:.95;}
    .btn.brand{
      background:linear-gradient(90deg,var(--brand),#9b7bff);
      border-color:transparent;
    }
    .btn.good{background:rgba(43,213,118,.12); border-color:rgba(43,213,118,.35);}
    .btn.bad{background:rgba(255,107,107,.12); border-color:rgba(255,107,107,.35);}
    .ghost{
      background:transparent;
      border:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.08);
      color:var(--muted);
      padding:7px 10px;
      border-radius:10px;
      cursor:pointer;
      font-weight:800;
    }
    .ghost:hover{color:var(--text); background:var(--panel2);}
    .mini{padding:6px 8px; border-radius:10px; font-size:12px;}
    .w100{width:100%;}

    input, select, textarea{
      width:100%;
      background:var(--panel2);
      color:var(--text);
      border:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.08);
      border-radius:10px;
      padding:8px 10px;
      outline:none;
      font-family:var(--font);
      font-size:14px;
    }
    textarea{min-height:70px; resize:vertical;}

    /* ===== Layout ===== */
    .layout{
      display:grid;
      grid-template-columns:260px minmax(0,1fr) 320px;
      gap:14px; padding:14px;
      max-width:1250px; margin:0 auto;
    }
    aside.sidebar, main.center{display:flex; flex-direction:column; gap:12px;}

    .card{
      background:var(--panel);
      border:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.08);
      border-radius:var(--radius);
      padding:12px;
      box-shadow:var(--shadow);
    }
    .divider{height:1px; background:rgba(255,255,255,.08); margin:8px 0;}

    /* ===== Avatar ===== */
    .avatar{
      width:40px;height:40px;border-radius:50%;
      background:linear-gradient(135deg,#2b3b77,#0d1b44);
      display:grid;place-items:center;font-weight:900;color:#fff;
      border:2px solid rgba(255,255,255,.08);
      flex:0 0 auto;
    }
    .avatar.lg{width:64px;height:64px;font-size:20px;}

    /* ===== Me Card ===== */
    .me-row{display:flex; gap:10px; align-items:center;}
    .me-name{font-weight:900; font-size:18px;}
    .me-handle{color:var(--muted); font-weight:700;}
    .me-stats{display:flex; gap:10px; margin-top:6px; font-size:12px; color:var(--muted);}

    /* ===== Composer ===== */
    .composer-head{display:flex; gap:8px;}
    .composer-tools{
      display:grid; grid-template-columns:1fr 170px 160px;
      gap:8px; margin-top:8px;
    }

      display:flex; align-items:center; justify-content:space-between;
      margin-top:8px;
    }

    /* ===== Lists / Posts ===== */
    .list{display:flex; flex-direction:column; gap:10px;}
    .post{display:flex; gap:10px;}
    .post-body{flex:1; min-width:0;}
    .post-meta{display:flex; align-items:center; gap:8px; flex-wrap:wrap;}
    .post-author{font-weight:900; cursor:pointer;}
    .post-handle, .post-time{color:var(--muted); font-size:12px;}
    .post-visibility{
      font-size:11px; padding:2px 6px; border-radius:999px; background:var(--panel2);
    }
    .post-text{white-space:pre-wrap; line-height:1.4; margin:6px 0;}
    .post-img{
      max-width:100%;
      border-radius:14px;
      border:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.08);
      margin-top:4px;
    }

    .tags{display:flex; gap:6px; flex-wrap:wrap;}
    .tag{
      font-size:12px; color:var(--brand2);
      background:rgba(79,209,197,.12);
      border:1px dashed rgba(79,209,197,.5);
      padding:2px 6px; border-radius:999px; cursor:pointer;
    }

    .post-actions{display:flex; gap:6px; margin-top:6px; flex-wrap:wrap;}
    .action{
      font-size:13px; color:var(--muted);
      padding:6px 8px; border-radius:10px; cursor:pointer;
      border:1px solid transparent; background:transparent;
    }
    .action:hover{background:var(--panel2); color:var(--text);}
    .action.active{
      color:var(--brand);
      background:rgba(124,92,255,.12);
      border-color:rgba(124,92,255,.35);
    }

    .comments{display:none; margin-top:8px;}
    .comments.open{display:block;}
    .comment{display:flex; gap:8px; padding:6px 0; border-top:1px dashed rgba(255,255,255,.08);}
    .comment:first-child{border-top:0;}

    /* ===== Trending ===== */
    .trending{display:flex; flex-direction:column; gap:8px;}
    .trend-item{
      display:flex; align-items:center; justify-content:space-between;
      background:var(--panel2); padding:8px; border-radius:12px; cursor:pointer;
    }

    /* ===== Modal ===== */
    .modal-backdrop{
      position:fixed; inset:0; background:rgba(0,0,0,.55);
      display:grid; place-items:center; z-index:100;
    }
    .modal{
      width:min(420px,92vw); background:var(--panel);
      border:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.08);
      border-radius:16px; padding:14px; box-shadow:var(--shadow);
    }
    .tab-row{display:flex; gap:6px; margin:8px 0;}
    .tab{
      flex:1; padding:8px; border-radius:10px; font-weight:800;
      background:var(--panel2); border:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.08); color:var(--muted);
      cursor:pointer;
    }
    .tab.active{
      background:linear-gradient(90deg,var(--brand),#9b7bff);
      color:white; border-color:transparent;
    }
    .tab-content{display:flex; flex-direction:column; gap:6px;}

    /* ===== Toast ===== */
    .toast{
      position:fixed; bottom:14px; left:50%; transform:translateX(-50%);
      background:var(--panel); border:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.1);
      padding:10px 12px; border-radius:12px; box-shadow:var(--shadow);
      display:none; z-index:999;
    }
    .toast.show{display:block;}

    /* ===== Responsive ===== */
    @media (max-width: 980px){
      .layout{grid-template-columns:230px minmax(0,1fr);}
      aside.right{display:none;}
      .composer-tools{grid-template-columns:1fr 150px 150px;}
    }
    @media (max-width: 720px){
      .layout{grid-template-columns:1fr;}
      aside.left{order:2;}
      main.center{order:1;}
      header.topbar{grid-template-columns:1fr; position:static;}
      .composer-tools{grid-template-columns:1fr;}
    }
  </style>
</head>

            <div class="me-name" id="meName">User</div>
            <div class="me-handle" id="meHandle">@user</div>
            <div class="me-stats">
              <div><span id="mePosts">0</span> Posts</div>
              <div><span id="meFollowers">0</span> Followers</div>
              <div><span id="meFollowing">0</span> Following</div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div class="divider"></div>
        <button id="editProfileBtn" class="btn brand w100">Edit profile</button>
      </section>

      <section class="card">
        <div style="font-weight:900; margin-bottom:6px;">Trending</div>
        <div id="trendingList" class="trending"></div>
      </section>

        <div class="composer-tools">

  <!-- AUTH MODAL -->
  <div class="modal-backdrop" id="authBackdrop">
    <div class="modal">
      <h2 style="margin:0 0 6px">Welcome to Pulse+</h2>
      <div class="muted tiny">Create an account or log in</div>

      <div class="tab-row">
        <button class="tab active" data-tab="login">Login</button>
        <button class="tab" data-tab="signup">Sign up</button>
      </div>

      <div class="tab-content" id="loginTab">
        <label class="tiny muted">Username</label>
        <input id="loginUser" placeholder="e.g. alex"/>
        <label class="tiny muted">Password</label>
        <input id="loginPass" type="password" placeholder="••••••"/>
        <button id="loginBtn" class="btn brand w100">Login</button>
      </div>

      <div class="tab-content hidden" id="signupTab">
        <label class="tiny muted">Display name</label>
        <input id="signupName" placeholder="Your name"/>
        <label class="tiny muted">Username (unique)</label>
        <input id="signupUser" placeholder="no spaces"/>
        <label class="tiny muted">Password</label>
        <input id="signupPass" type="password" placeholder="min 4 chars"/>
        <label class="tiny muted">Bio (optional)</label>
        <input id="signupBio" placeholder="Short bio"/>
        <button id="signupBtn" class="btn brand w100">Create account</button>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <!-- TOAST -->
  <div class="toast" id="toast"></div>

  <script>
    /* ===========================================================
       Pulse+ Social Media (Fixed JS)
       Single-file localStorage app
    =========================================================== */

    const store = {
      load(key, fallback){
        try { return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(key)) ?? fallback; }
        catch { return fallback; }
      },
      save(key, val){
        localStorage.setItem(key, JSON.stringify(val));
      }
    };
    const $ = s => document.querySelector(s);
    const $$ = s => Array.from(document.querySelectorAll(s));

    const uid = () => Math.random().toString(36).slice(2) + Date.now().toString(36);
    const timeAgo = ts => {
      const sec = Math.floor((Date.now()-ts)/1000);
      if(sec<60) return sec+"s ago";
      const min=Math.floor(sec/60); if(min<60) return min+"m ago";
      const hr=Math.floor(min/60); if(hr<24) return hr+"h ago";
      return Math.floor(hr/24)+"d ago";
    };
    const initials = name => name.split(" ").map(w=>w[0]).slice(0,2).join("").toUpperCase();
    const tagsFrom = text => (text.match(/#\w+/g)||[]).map(t=>t.toLowerCase());
    const mentionsFrom = text => (text.match(/@\w+/g)||[]).map(t=>t.toLowerCase());
    const escapeHtml = s => s.replace(/[&<>"]/g, c => ({ "&":"&amp;","<":"&lt;",">":"&gt;",'"':"&quot;" }[c]));

    let users   = store.load("pulse_users_fixed", []);
    let posts   = store.load("pulse_posts_fixed", []);
    let session = store.load("pulse_session_fixed", null);
    let theme   = store.load("pulse_theme_fixed", "dark");

    let view="feed";
    let viewedUserId=null;
    let searchQuery="";
    let sortMode="new";

    function persist(){
      store.save("pulse_users_fixed", users);
      store.save("pulse_posts_fixed", posts);
      store.save("pulse_session_fixed", session);
      store.save("pulse_theme_fixed", theme);
    }

    function toast(msg){
      const t=$("#toast");
      t.textContent=msg;
      t.classList.add("show");
      setTimeout(()=>t.classList.remove("show"),1600);
    }

    function currentUser(){
      return users.find(u=>u.id===session?.userId) || null;
    }

    function showAuth(show){
      $("#authBackdrop").classList.toggle("hidden", !show);
    }

    function login(username, password){
      const u = users.find(x=>x.username===username.toLowerCase());
      if(!u || u.password!==password) return false;
      session={userId:u.id};
      persist();
      return true;
    }

    function signup(name, username, password, bio){
      username=username.toLowerCase().trim();
      if(!username || username.includes(" ")) return "Invalid username.";
      if(users.some(u=>u.username===username)) return "Username already taken.";
      if(password.length<4) return "Password too short.";

      const u={
        id:uid(),
        name:name.trim()||username,
        username,
        password,
        bio:bio?.trim()||"",
        followers:[],
        following:[],
        createdAt:Date.now()
      };
      users.push(u);
      persist();
      return u;
    }

    function canSeePost(p, viewerId){
      if(p.visibility==="public") return true;
      if(p.visibility==="private") return p.authorId===viewerId;
      const author = users.find(u=>u.id===p.authorId);
      return p.authorId===viewerId || author?.followers.includes(viewerId);
    }

    function createPost(){
      const me=currentUser();
      const text=$("#postText").value.trim();
      if(!text) return toast("Write something first.");
      if(text.length>280) return toast("Too long. Max 280.");

      const p={
        id:uid(),
        authorId:me.id,
        text,
        imageUrl:$("#imageUrl").value.trim(),
        visibility:$("#visibility").value,
        mood:$("#mood").value,
        tags:tagsFrom(text),
        mentions:mentionsFrom(text),
        likes:[],
        savedBy:[],
        comments:[],
        createdAt:Date.now()
      };
      posts.unshift(p);
      persist();

      $("#postText").value="";
      $("#imageUrl").value="";
      $("#mood").value="";
      $("#charCount").textContent="0/280";

      toast("Posted!");
      renderAll();
    }

    function toggleLike(postId){
      const me=currentUser();
      const p=posts.find(x=>x.id===postId);
      if(!p) return;
      const i=p.likes.indexOf(me.id);
      if(i>=0) p.likes.splice(i,1);
      else p.likes.push(me.id);
      persist(); renderAll();
    }

    function toggleSave(postId){
      const me=currentUser();
      const p=posts.find(x=>x.id===postId);
      if(!p) return;
      const i=p.savedBy.indexOf(me.id);
      if(i>=0) p.savedBy.splice(i,1);
      else p.savedBy.push(me.id);
      persist(); renderAll();
    }

    function addComment(postId, val){
      const me=currentUser();
      const p=posts.find(x=>x.id===postId);
      if(!p) return;
      const c=val.trim();
      if(!c) return;
      p.comments.push({id:uid(), authorId:me.id, text:c, createdAt:Date.now()});
      persist(); renderAll();
    }

    function deletePost(postId){
      const me=currentUser();
      const i=posts.findIndex(p=>p.id===postId && p.authorId===me.id);
      if(i>=0){
        posts.splice(i,1);
        persist(); renderAll(); toast("Post deleted");
      }
    }

    function follow(userId){
      const me=currentUser();
      if(me.id===userId) return;
      const other=users.find(u=>u.id===userId);
      if(!other) return;
      if(!me.following.includes(userId)) me.following.push(userId);
      if(!other.followers.includes(me.id)) other.followers.push(me.id);
      persist(); renderAll();
    }

    function unfollow(userId){
      const me=currentUser();
      const other=users.find(u=>u.id===userId);
      if(!other) return;
      me.following=me.following.filter(x=>x!==userId);
      other.followers=other.followers.filter(x=>x!==me.id);
      persist(); renderAll();
    }

    function setView(v){
      view=v;
      const views=["feed","explore","people","saved","profile"];
      views.forEach(x=>$("#"+x+"View").classList.toggle("hidden", x!==v));
      $$(".navbtn").forEach(b=>b.classList.toggle("active", b.dataset.view===v));
      renderAll();
    }

    function renderMe(){
      const me=currentUser();
      $("#meAvatar").textContent=initials(me.name);
      $("#meName").textContent=me.name;
      $("#meHandle").textContent="@"+me.username;
      $("#mePosts").textContent=posts.filter(p=>p.authorId===me.id).length;
      $("#meFollowers").textContent=me.followers.length;
      $("#meFollowing").textContent=me.following.length;
      $("#composerAvatar").textContent=initials(me.name);
    }

    function renderTrending(){
      const freq={};
      posts.forEach(p=>p.tags.forEach(t=>freq[t]=(freq[t]||0)+1));
      const items=Object.entries(freq).sort((a,b)=>b[1]-a[1]).slice(0,8);

      const wrap=$("#trendingList");
      wrap.innerHTML=items.length?"":"<div class='muted tiny'>No tags yet</div>";
      items.forEach(([tag,count])=>{
        const d=document.createElement("div");
        d.className="trend-item";
        d.innerHTML=`<span class="tag">${tag}</span><span class="muted tiny">${count}</span>`;
        d.onclick=()=>{searchQuery=tag; $("#globalSearch").value=tag; setView("feed");};
        wrap.appendChild(d);
      });
    }

    function renderPost(p){
      const me=currentUser();
      const author=users.find(u=>u.id===p.authorId);
      if(!author) return document.createElement("div");

      const el=document.createElement("div");
      el.className="post";
      const liked=p.likes.includes(me.id);
      const saved=p.savedBy.includes(me.id);

      el.innerHTML=`
        <div class="avatar">${initials(author.name)}</div>
        <div class="post-body">
          <div class="post-meta">
            <span class="post-author" data-open="${author.id}">${escapeHtml(author.name)}</span>
            <span class="post-handle">@${author.username}</span>
            <span class="post-time">• ${timeAgo(p.createdAt)}</span>
            <span class="post-visibility">${p.visibility}</span>
            ${p.mood?`<span class="post-visibility">${p.mood}</span>`:""}
            ${p.authorId===me.id?`<button class="ghost mini" data-del="${p.id}">🗑 delete</button>`:""}
          </div>

          <div class="post-text">${escapeHtml(p.text)}</div>
          ${p.imageUrl?`<img class="post-img" src="${p.imageUrl}" onerror="this.remove()">`:""}

          <div class="tags">
            ${p.tags.map(t=>`<span class="tag" data-tag="${t}">${t}</span>`).join("")}
          </div>

          <div class="post-actions">
            <button class="action ${liked?"active":""}" data-like="${p.id}">❤️ ${p.likes.length}</button>
            <button class="action" data-toggle-comments="${p.id}">💬 ${p.comments.length}</button>
            <button class="action ${saved?"active":""}" data-save="${p.id}">🔖 ${saved?"Saved":"Save"}</button>
          </div>

          <div class="comments" id="comments-${p.id}">
            <div style="display:flex; gap:6px; margin-top:6px;">
              <input placeholder="Write a comment..." data-comment-input="${p.id}">
              <button class="btn mini" data-comment-btn="${p.id}">Send</button>
            </div>
            <div class="list" style="margin-top:6px;">
              ${p.comments.map(c=>{
                const cu=users.find(u=>u.id===c.authorId);
                if(!cu) return "";
                return `
                  <div class="comment">
                    <div class="avatar" style="width:28px;height:28px;font-size:12px">${initials(cu.name)}</div>
                    <div>
                      <div class="muted tiny"><b data-open="${cu.id}" style="cursor:pointer">${escapeHtml(cu.name)}</b> • ${timeAgo(c.createdAt)}</div>
                      <div>${escapeHtml(c.text)}</div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                `;
              }).join("")}
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      `;

      el.querySelectorAll("[data-like]").forEach(b=>b.onclick=()=>toggleLike(b.dataset.like));
      el.querySelectorAll("[data-save]").forEach(b=>b.onclick=()=>toggleSave(b.dataset.save));
      el.querySelectorAll("[data-toggle-comments]").forEach(b=>b.onclick=()=>{
        $("#comments-"+b.dataset.toggleComments).classList.toggle("open");
      });
      el.querySelectorAll("[data-comment-btn]").forEach(b=>b.onclick=()=>{
        const pid=b.dataset.commentBtn;
        const input=el.querySelector(`[data-comment-input="${pid}"]`);
        addComment(pid, input.value);
        input.value="";
      });
      el.querySelectorAll("[data-open]").forEach(x=>x.onclick=()=>{
        viewedUserId=x.dataset.open;
        setView("profile");
      });
      el.querySelectorAll("[data-tag]").forEach(t=>t.onclick=()=>{
        searchQuery=t.dataset.tag;
        $("#globalSearch").value=searchQuery;
        setView("feed");
      });
      el.querySelectorAll("[data-del]").forEach(x=>x.onclick=()=>deletePost(x.dataset.del));

      return el;
    }

    function renderFeed(){
      const me=currentUser();
      let list=posts.filter(p=>canSeePost(p, me.id));

      if(searchQuery){
        const q=searchQuery.toLowerCase();
        list=list.filter(p=>{
          const a=users.find(u=>u.id===p.authorId);
          return p.text.toLowerCase().includes(q) ||
                 p.tags.some(t=>t.includes(q)) ||
                 a?.username.includes(q) ||
                 a?.name.toLowerCase().includes(q);
        });
      }

      if(sortMode==="top") list=list.slice().sort((a,b)=>b.likes.length-a.likes.length);
      if(sortMode==="mine") list=list.filter(p=>p.authorId===me.id);
      if(sortMode==="following") list=list.filter(p=>me.following.includes(p.authorId));

      const wrap=$("#feedList");
      wrap.innerHTML="";
      if(!list.length){
        wrap.innerHTML="<div class='muted'>No posts yet.</div>";
        return;
      }
      list.forEach(p=>wrap.appendChild(renderPost(p)));
    }

    function renderExplore(){
      const me=currentUser();
      const list=posts.filter(p=>p.visibility==="public" && canSeePost(p, me.id));
      const wrap=$("#exploreList");
      wrap.innerHTML="";
      if(!list.length){
        wrap.innerHTML="<div class='muted'>Nothing to explore.</div>";
        return;
      }
      list.forEach(p=>wrap.appendChild(renderPost(p)));
    }

    function renderPeople(){
      const me=currentUser();
      const q=$("#peopleSearch").value.toLowerCase().trim();
      const list=users.filter(u=>u.id!==me.id).filter(u=>{
        if(!q) return true;
        return u.username.includes(q) || u.name.toLowerCase().includes(q);
      });

      const wrap=$("#peopleList");
      wrap.innerHTML="";
      if(!list.length){
        wrap.innerHTML="<div class='muted'>No users found.</div>";
        return;
      }

      list.forEach(u=>{
        const following=me.following.includes(u.id);
        const d=document.createElement("div");
        d.className="card";
        d.style.padding="8px";
        d.innerHTML=`
          <div style="display:flex; align-items:center; justify-content:space-between; gap:8px;">
            <div style="display:flex; align-items:center; gap:8px;">
              <div class="avatar" style="width:34px;height:34px;">${initials(u.name)}</div>
              <div>
                <div style="font-weight:800;">${escapeHtml(u.name)}</div>
                <div class="muted tiny">@${u.username}</div>
              </div>
            </div>
            <button class="btn ${following?"bad":"good"}">${following?"Unfollow":"Follow"}</button>
          </div>
        `;
        d.querySelector("button").onclick=()=>following?unfollow(u.id):follow(u.id);
        d.onclick=(e)=>{ if(e.target.tagName!=="BUTTON"){ viewedUserId=u.id; setView("profile"); } };
        wrap.appendChild(d);
      });
    }

    function renderSaved(){
      const me=currentUser();
      const list=posts.filter(p=>p.savedBy.includes(me.id) && canSeePost(p, me.id));
      const wrap=$("#savedList");
      wrap.innerHTML="";
      if(!list.length){
        wrap.innerHTML="<div class='muted'>Nothing saved yet.</div>";
        return;
      }
      list.forEach(p=>wrap.appendChild(renderPost(p)));
    }

    function renderProfile(){
      const me=currentUser();
      let u=viewedUserId?users.find(x=>x.id===viewedUserId):me;
      if(!u){ u=me; viewedUserId=null; }

      $("#profileHeader").innerHTML=`
        <div style="display:flex; gap:10px; align-items:center;">
          <div class="avatar lg">${initials(u.name)}</div>
          <div style="flex:1;">
            <div style="font-weight:900; font-size:20px;">${escapeHtml(u.name)}</div>
            <div class="muted">@${u.username}</div>
            <div class="muted tiny" style="margin-top:6px;">${escapeHtml(u.bio||"No bio yet.")}</div>
            <div class="muted tiny" style="margin-top:6px; display:flex; gap:12px;">
              <div>${posts.filter(p=>p.authorId===u.id).length} posts</div>
              <div>${u.followers.length} followers</div>
              <div>${u.following.length} following</div>
            </div>
          </div>
          ${
            u.id===me.id ? "" :
            me.following.includes(u.id)
              ? `<button class="btn bad" id="unfollowBtn">Unfollow</button>`
              : `<button class="btn good" id="followBtn">Follow</button>`
          }
        </div>
      `;
      const fb=$("#followBtn"); if(fb) fb.onclick=()=>follow(u.id);
      const ufb=$("#unfollowBtn"); if(ufb) ufb.onclick=()=>unfollow(u.id);

      const wrap=$("#profilePostsList");
      wrap.innerHTML="";
      const list=posts.filter(p=>p.authorId===u.id && canSeePost(p, me.id));
      if(!list.length){
        wrap.innerHTML="<div class='muted'>No posts yet</div>";
        return;
      }
      list.forEach(p=>wrap.appendChild(renderPost(p)));
    }

    function renderSuggestions(){
      const me=currentUser();
      const list=users.filter(u=>u.id!==me.id && !me.following.includes(u.id))
                      .sort(()=>Math.random()-0.5).slice(0,6);
      const wrap=$("#suggestList");
      wrap.innerHTML="";
      list.forEach(u=>{
        const d=document.createElement("div");
        d.className="card";
        d.style.padding="8px";
        d.innerHTML=`
          <div style="display:flex; justify-content:space-between; align-items:center;">
            <div style="display:flex; gap:8px; align-items:center;">
              <div class="avatar" style="width:30px;height:30px;font-size:12px;">${initials(u.name)}</div>
              <div>
                <div style="font-weight:800; font-size:13px;">${escapeHtml(u.name)}</div>
                <div class="muted tiny">@${u.username}</div>
              </div>
            </div>
            <button class="btn good mini">Follow</button>
          </div>
        `;
        d.querySelector("button").onclick=()=>follow(u.id);
        d.onclick=(e)=>{ if(e.target.tagName!=="BUTTON"){ viewedUserId=u.id; setView("profile"); } };
        wrap.appendChild(d);
      });
    }

    function renderAll(){
      renderMe();
      renderTrending();
      renderSuggestions();
      if(view==="feed") renderFeed();
      if(view==="explore") renderExplore();
      if(view==="people") renderPeople();
      if(view==="saved") renderSaved();
      if(view==="profile") renderProfile();
    }

    function applyTheme(){
      document.documentElement.setAttribute("data-theme", theme);
      $("#themeToggle").textContent = theme==="dark"?"🌙":"☀️";
    }

    function seedIfEmpty(){
      if(users.length) return;
      const a=signup("Alex River","alex","1234","I like tech & music.");
      const b=signup("Maya Chen","maya","1234","Coffee + coding.");
      const c=signup("Sam K.","sam","1234","Traveling.");
      session={userId:a.id};

      posts=[
        {
          id:uid(), authorId:b.id,
          text:"Hello Pulse+! #firstpost",
          imageUrl:"https://picsum.photos/900/450?1",
          visibility:"public", mood:"happy",
          tags:["#firstpost"], mentions:[], likes:[a.id], savedBy:[], comments:[],
          createdAt:Date.now()-1000*60*33
        },
        {
          id:uid(), authorId:a.id,
          text:"Building a fixed social app 😄 #webdev #javascript",
          imageUrl:"",
          visibility:"public", mood:"hyped",
          tags:["#webdev","#javascript"], mentions:[], likes:[b.id,c.id], savedBy:[c.id],
          comments:[{id:uid(), authorId:c.id, text:"This is awesome!", createdAt:Date.now()-1000*60*10}],
          createdAt:Date.now()-1000*60*70
        }
      ];
      a.following=[b.id,c.id]; b.followers=[a.id]; c.followers=[a.id];
      persist();
    }

    function wireEvents(){
      $$(".navbtn").forEach(b=>b.onclick=()=>setView(b.dataset.view));

      $("#postText").addEventListener("input", ()=>{
        const n=$("#postText").value.length;
        $("#charCount").textContent=`${n}/280`;
        $("#charCount").style.color = n>280 ? "var(--bad)" : "var(--muted)";
      });

      $("#postBtn").onclick=createPost;

      $("#sortFeed").onchange=()=>{ sortMode=$("#sortFeed").value; renderAll(); };

      $("#peopleSearch").addEventListener("input", renderPeople);

      $("#globalSearch").addEventListener("input", ()=>{
        searchQuery=$("#globalSearch").value.trim();
        renderAll();
      });
      $("#clearSearch").onclick=()=>{
        searchQuery=""; $("#globalSearch").value=""; renderAll();
      };

      $("#editProfileBtn").onclick=()=>{
        const me=currentUser();
        const name=prompt("Display name:", me.name) ?? me.name;
        const bio=prompt("Bio:", me.bio) ?? me.bio;
        me.name=name.trim()||me.name;
        me.bio=bio.trim();
        persist(); renderAll(); toast("Profile updated");
      };

      $("#themeToggle").onclick=()=>{
        theme=theme==="dark"?"light":"dark";
        applyTheme(); persist();
      };

      $("#logoutBtn").onclick=()=>{
        session=null; persist(); location.reload();
      };

      $$(".tab").forEach(t=>t.onclick=()=>{
        $$(".tab").forEach(x=>x.classList.remove("active"));
        t.classList.add("active");
        const tab=t.dataset.tab;
        $("#loginTab").classList.toggle("hidden", tab!=="login");
        $("#signupTab").classList.toggle("hidden", tab!=="signup");
      });

      $("#loginBtn").onclick=()=>{
        const ok=login($("#loginUser").value, $("#loginPass").value);
        if(!ok) return toast("Wrong username or password");
        showAuth(false); boot();
      };

      $("#signupBtn").onclick=()=>{
        const u=signup($("#signupName").value, $("#signupUser").value, $("#signupPass").value, $("#signupBio").value);
        if(typeof u==="string") return toast(u);
        session={userId:u.id}; persist();
        showAuth(false); boot(); toast("Account created!");
      };
    }

    function boot(){
      applyTheme();
      if(!session){ showAuth(true); return; }
      showAuth(false);
      setView("feed");
      renderAll();
    }

    seedIfEmpty();
    wireEvents();
    boot();
  </script>
</body>
</html>

If you paste this and still see an error, it means some old broken CSS is still in your file.
In that case, delete everything in your current index.html and paste this fresh.
